item.title: Planetarium, modern regional science centre to be set up in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[A high-level meeting chaired by Minister for Minor Irrigation, Science, and Technology N.S. Boseraju has resolved to prepare a proposal for the construction of a state-of-the-art planetarium and a modern regional science centre in Raichur city.
The Minister emphasised the priority of establishing science centres in every district across the State and directed that the construction of the Raichur Regional Science Centre be expedited.
He instructed the architectural team to present a design for ...]]>

item.title: Suzuki Access 125 [2020-2024] On Road Price in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Access 125 [2020-2024] Running Cost
The Access 125 [2020-2024] has a running cost of Rs. 2.22 per kilometer and a monthly fuel cost of Rs. 3333, assuming a daily run of 50 kilometers and Petrol at Rs. 100 per liter.
